document_notes.text:
This update for php7 fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2019-11034: Fixed a heap-buffer overflow in php_ifd_get32si() (bsc#1132838).
- CVE-2019-11035: Fixed a heap-buffer overflow in exif_iif_add_value() (bsc#1132837).
- CVE-2019-11036: Fixed buffer over-read in exif_process_IFD_TAG function leading to information disclosure (bsc#1134322).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: When processing certain files, PHP EXIF extension in versions 7.1.x below 7.1.28, 7.2.x below 7.2.17 and 7.3.x below 7.3.4 can be caused to read past allocated buffer in exif_process_IFD_TAG function. This may lead to information disclosure or crash.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

notes.text: When processing certain files, PHP EXIF extension in versions 7.1.x below 7.1.29, 7.2.x below 7.2.18 and 7.3.x below 7.3.5 can be caused to read past allocated buffer in exif_process_IFD_TAG function. This may lead to information disclosure or crash.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
